thread.title: Arsenal slip up in title race: how Premier League standings look like after GW-19 - Football | Tribuna.com
thread.title_full: Arsenal slip up in title race: how Premier League standings look like after GW-19 - Football | Tribuna.com

author: Uttiyo Scarnage
title: Arsenal slip up in title race: how Premier League standings look like after GW-19 - Football | Tribuna.com
text: 2 3 [Arsenal](https://tribuna.com/en/clubs/arsenal/) suffered a 2-0 loss to [West Ham United](https://tribuna.com/en/clubs/west-ham/) in the Premier League at the Emirates Stadium. The Gunners were just unable to convert all the chances they created and were made to pay int he end. In doing so, Arsenal failed to move back up to first place in the Premier League table and are now in second place - two points behind Liverpool. What is worse is that the Gunners are only three points ahead of Man City, who have a game in hand. Mikel Arteta's side will be keen on ending the year on a high note against Fulham on New Year's Eve. [Arsenal – West Ham 0:2](https://tribuna.com/en/match/arsenal-vs-west-ham/)(0:1, 0:1)28 December, 20:15, Emirates Stadium Arsenal: [Raya](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/david-raya/), [Zinchenko](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/oleksandr-zinchenko/)( [Nelson](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/reiss-nelson/)64), [dos Santos Magalhães](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/gabriel-magalhaes/), [Saliba](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/william-saliba/), [White](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/ben-white/), [Rice](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/declan-rice/), [Odegaard](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/martin-odegaard/), [Trossard](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/leandro-trossard/)( [Smith Rowe](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/emile-smith-rowe/)79), [Martinelli](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/gabriel-martinelli/)( [Nketiah](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/edward-nketiah/)64), [de Jesus](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/gabriel-jesus/), [Saka](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/bukayo-saka/) West Ham: [Areola](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/alphonse-areola/), [Emerson](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/emerson/), [Ogbonna](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/angelo-ogbonna/), [Mavropanos](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/konstantinos-mavropanos/), [Coufal](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/vladimir-coufal/), [Souček](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/tomas-soucek/), [Alvarez](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/edson-alvarez/), [Lucas Paquetá](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/lucas-paqueta/)( [Benrahma](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/said-benrahma/)33), [Ward-Prowse](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/james-ward-prowse/), [Kudus](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/mohammed-kudus/), [Bowen](https://tribuna.com/en/persons/jarrod-bowen/) Goals: 0:2 -
